name: Record of Agarest War 2
description:
Journey to the world of Agarest, a land teetering on the brink of destruction. With an engaging active grid-based battle system, this revamped style offers faster action and more play! HD graphics offer beautifully design characters and places. New mini-games provide players with new ways to bring their character stats up! A new Agarest universe gives players more walk around flexibility. Record of Agarest War 2 is a stunning addition to the hit series.
